short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Urban Browser Guard safeguards your online privacy and blocks harmful content, including malicious websites and intrusive ads

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,el,en,en_AU,en_GB,e:
Urban Browser Guard Chrome extension adds a security layer that blocks access to malicious websites while filtering out annoying ads and other unwanted content.

Urban Browser Guard protects your digital fingerprints from leaking into the wrong hands and prevents identity theft, malware ads, and phishing attempts, whether you‚Äôre in a public place or at home. 

What does Urban Browser Guard do?

üõ°Ô∏è Advance browser protection: Blocking access to malicious sites and ads, improving secure browsing and private internet security.

‚õèÔ∏è Mining Site Alerts: Receive alerts about cryptocurrency mining websites that could compromise your device's performance and security.

üßπ Clear Cache and History: Clear your browser cache and history, ensuring your data stays private. 

üö´ Block Analytics Requests: Easily block analytics requests that track your online behavior.

This extension is an all-in-one browser protection solution. You don't need to download additional software‚Äîclick "Add to Chrome" to install the extension, and you're set to browse freely.

To enable us to block malware ads and provide you with digital fingerprinting hiding features, we need to access and collect certain information, such as: URLs you click, the ads displayed for you and your interaction with the ads, history, click stream data, and IP address.

In addition, subject to your consent through the prominent notice, we will be accessing and collecting your web browsing data that includes information on:

- search engine results page
- web pages visited
- clicked stream data
- information about the content that you viewed (the ad campaign)
- information about where you viewed the content (website, app, or extension).

We share this web browsing data in an aggregated, anonymized format with our affiliated companies and business partners for commercial use.

We wish to clarify that we do not want to know your identity, preferences, or personal information about you, as detailed in the privacy policy (https://www.urban-vpn.com/about-us/privacy/).

Urban Browser Guard is a comprehensive Chrome browser extension for securing your connection. It will not slow your browser‚Äôs performance and will not affect bandwidth.
